subarray

public byte[] subarray(byte[] b,
                       int c,
                       int d)
This is the subarray method in byte array Returns a new byte that is a subarray of this byte. The subarray begins at the specified beginIndex and extends to the character at index endIndex - 1. Thus the length of the subarray is endIndex-beginIndex.
Parameters:
b - -checking first parameter of byte
c - -checking second parameter of byte
d - -checking third parameter of byte
